title: Yasuo
body:
WHY THE ACTUAL LIVING FUCK IS YASUO A CHAMPION
YOU SAY RIVEN COUNTERS HIM? ARE YOU ILL?
THE DUDE HAS 2 ITEMS AND THE DUDE HAS 100% CRIT
THEN THE DUDE BUILDS TANK AND THE DUDE 2 SHOTS YOU
??????
Riot, please.

replies.body: Don't worry. He's getting nerfs now.
The nerfs really only affect his bruiser build; crit-oriented build is basically unaffected.
So what? The bruiser build is cancer, the normal build is easy to deal with unless you're trash at the game.
The point I was getting at is that the OP was specifically complaining about Yasuo's crit chance, so there wasn't much point in reassuring him about incoming nerfs.
Ah okay. He did complain about tank build too doe.

riven counters him because she has burst and hard cc, while yasuo is squishy.

shes also more mobile than him.

bruh he just dashes everywhere legit matrix ffs
what is riot actually doing

> [{quoted}](name=fl0kymeister1337,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hvgrXJaQ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-08-29T22:59:38.403+0000)
>
> bruh he just dashes everywhere legit matrix ffs
> what is riot actually doing

he only dashes where there are minions with a 10s to 6s cooldown against the same enemy unit.

riven can dash and hop around wherever she wants. shes not nearly as restricted in her mobility as yasuo is.

Guys sorry for being salty in this thread, i've legitimately gone afk in a game where i was lvl 10 with Riven and the Yasuo was lvl 18.
I seriously don't know what Riot thought while making Yasuo, it's legitimately like playing urf with him.
Lifesteal. Crit. Health. Armor. Magic resist. Attack damage.
?????????????????????????????????????????????????
He doesn't get mr per level, and honestly you should try to play him and learn how to play against him before you make a salty rage post about yasuo.
